metadata.title: Week 1 Day 3: Introduction to Basic Latin Vocabulary

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of Latin pronunciation rules and the concept of noun cases. They should be familiar with the nominative and accusative cases and have been introduced to the idea of subject-verb-object order in simple Latin sentences. A basic vocabulary of common nouns and verbs has been established, focusing on words related to family and school.
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we focused on the nominative and accusative cases, practicing with simple sentences and learning vocabulary related to family members.

primary: Introduce new vocabulary related to school
Practice using nominative and accusative cases in sentences

lesson_flow.description: Review vocabulary from previous lessons using flashcards.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students will recall and pronounce vocabulary words aloud.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Focus on correct pronunciation and quick recall.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce new vocabulary related to school using flashcards and visuals.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students will listen and repeat new vocabulary words.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Use visuals to aid memory and understanding.

lesson_flow.description: Practice forming sentences using the new vocabulary and previously learned grammar.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students will form sentences in pairs, using the new vocabulary.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Circulate to provide support and correct errors.

lesson_flow.description: Students complete a worksheet with sentences to translate using new vocabulary.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students work individually to translate sentences.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Encourage students to use their notes and flashcards.

lesson_flow.description: Review key points of the lesson and address any questions.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students ask questions and participate in a brief discussion.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Clarify any misconceptions and reinforce correct usage.

lesson_flow.description: Summarize the lesson and preview the next class.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students listen and note down key points for the next lesson.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Highlight the connection between today's lesson and future topics.

behavior.loop_behavior: Repeat instructions and provide examples as needed
